COMMAND.NAME: setmark
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Create a mark with the given name in bufferName If there is already a mark in bufferName with markName it will be overwritten.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
